Articles.Content: Can't wait for this to be updated.

Okay guys, last news in:

RealChute v1.2 should be released by tomorrow 2pm EST. Don't hold me on that, but unless something major shows up tomorrow as I test a few last nitty gritty things, I literrally have a bugless version in front of me right now, and it's really not something I expected to have as fast. Apparently I did it just right when refactoring my code and didn't induce any bugs, which is a little surprising. We'll see what tomorrow holds, but for now I'll be heading to bed I think.

See you all hopefully pretty soon.

Ty for the great mod and the fast update

And here we are, as I expected, a clean playable version of RealChute is here!

Changelog:

July 18th 2014
v1.2
WARNING: ALL VESSELS AND CRAFT FILES WILL BREAK WITH THIS UPDATE. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
-v0.24 compatibility, built to work on Windows x64
-Completely changed the way multiple chutes on a part are handledÃ‚Â¸
-Very large part of the code refactored, once again
-Options from the RealChute_Settings.cfg file are now available to be tweaked from the SpaceCenter, icon gracefully offered by sumghai
-Parachutes are now contained into PARACHUTE{} nodes inside PART configs
-The plugin can now handle an indefinite amount of parachutes on a single part
-Various small bugfixes
-Now uses ModuleManager v2.2.0

Small changelog, but huge changes under the hood. Sorry there is not much features in this update, but trust me, the goal here was to facilitate the way down for me to add more of the good stuff. The next update should be especially juicy!

Now for this, a few big red warnings.

When you install this, please be sure to completely remove any previous install of RealChute. Also please note that this will break all currently in flight vessels, as well as all craft files, though you can update those by replacing the parts. All legacy parts have also been deprecated indefinitely for this update they no longer exist.

Now that this is said, please be wary that some bugs might have slipped through. If you see any problems with persistence and chutes not keeping their stats throughout gameplay, please give me as much information as possible, how it happened, screenies, logs, etc.

Hope you guys like the update!

Cheers
anyone else seeing load hang on this mod? freezes on load at, Realchutes/ legacy parts/ drogue_main_combo_chute/RC_combo_large. cannot get it to load past this point.
anyone else seeing load hang on this mod? freezes on load at, Realchutes/ legacy parts/ drogue_main_combo_chute/RC_combo_large. cannot get it to load past this point.

Someone did not read the big red text just in the last post.

I did a complete KSP wipe with the new release, .24 stock, no mods at all, adding the updated mods back in one at a time, no old mod folders or saved games to remove, or worry about.

Edit: And I wholly expect that what ever has gone wrong is on my end, I just haven't figured it out yet, I only posted to see if anyone else was having this issue, just to be sure.

Edited July 18, 2014 by vardicd

well, "legacy parts" should have rang a bell.

Though try redownloading it, I think I might'Ve dropped the wrong folder, new one should be okay.

Same situation: cleaned RealChutes before replacing for the newer version, but the loader hangs at the legacy parts. It works fine when removing them all from the folder. I'm on Linux (64 bits).

Edit: the last upload works fine \o/

Alright guys.

Check your RealChute folder. If there is a "legacy pars" folder, delete it, it should not be there. The download is updated to not include it. Merge problems on my side.

Guess I should've waited another few days to update, guess that's what I get for trying to work fast.

RS seems to breaking when loading RoverDude's DERP engine (which contains a parachute).

Loading hang at UmbraSpaceIndustries/Lifeboat/PodEngine/USI_PodEngine

*Update*

Nope, he included his own RS patch, which is breaking.
Yep, the new download went through on the first try. I was sure I had done something stupid on my end. Oh well, this is an awesome mod, one of my must haves. Thanks for the quick response.

If it uses RealChute, all non updated parts will fail to load. That means delete them until they're updated.

Alright guys.

Check your RealChute folder. If there is a "legacy pars" folder, delete it, it should not be there. The download is updated to not include it. Merge problems on my side.

Guess I should've waited another few days to update, guess that's what I get for trying to work fast.

I'm just happy to have got an updated mod so quickly!

If it uses RealChute, all non updated parts will fail to load. That means delete them until they're updated.

Yup. Is what changed documented anywhere, so that I can try to update it myself?
And wow by the way, did you increase the size of the chute canopies, cause I've never seen a parachute this big compared to the single man pod.

Yup. Is what changed documented anywhere, so that I can try to update it myself?

Yes, basically all parachutes will end up in a sub config node inside the RealChuteModule config node. Look at the RealChute part configs and in the OP.

And wow by the way, did you increase the size of the chute canopies, cause I've never seen a parachute this big compared to the single man pod.

http://i.imgur.com/9GLYmga.jpg

99.999% sure you pressed "Apply settings" after building your whole craft and it computed the size using all the craft.

Trying RealChute mod (many thanks for this mod) on 64bit version.

RealChute Stack Chute doesn't work for me.

1. Cannot select it in VAB. Only RMB with "Toggle info" available. Cannot adjust its' settings. (http://imgur.com/a/jY9e3#0)

2. When on launchpad - the chute disappears (http://imgur.com/a/jY9e3#1)
99.999% sure you pressed "Apply settings" after building your whole craft and it computed the size using all the craft.

Trying RealChute mod (many thanks for this mod) on 64bit version.

RealChute Stack Chute doesn't work for me.

1. Cannot select it in VAB. Only RMB with "Toggle info" available. Cannot adjust its' settings. (http://imgur.com/a/jY9e3#0)

2. When on launchpad - the chute disappears (http://imgur.com/a/jY9e3#1)

Try re-downloading it again, just to be sure your DL, didn't glitch, and then re-install it to your game. Your issue sounds like maybe you got a bad download to me, and also be sure if you're updating you deleted the old RC folder.
Okay Horus, apologies incoming, you were right, I am able to reproduce, though this is the only RC part I've found so far that isn't working.
Yes, I've made an additional check with only RC & MM installed. The issue persists with only this stack chute.

Found the bug, thanks for the quick feedback. Nothing big, fix is under way.

But next time guys,m send me your logs, that would've saved me a 15 minutes :/
